title: D-Day Survivor: Interview with Dr. Richard Rung
itunes:title: D-Day Survivor: Interview with Dr. Richard Rung
description: On June 6, 2020, we celebrated the 76th anniversary of D-Day. In this episode, Wheaton honorary alum and retired Wheaton College Political Science professor, Dr. Richard Rung, shares his recollections of his participation in this historic day. Commemorate this recent anniversary with memories from someone who was there!
